title: Shen Pentakill

embed.description: So after like 1500+ games on Shen, the day finally happened. I had Abyssal Sceptor, Wit's End, Sunfire Cape, Thornmail, and Merc Treads were the items I had during the moment. Guide: http://www.mobafire.com/league-of-legends/build/yummy-rices-s6-guide-to-top-lane-shen-the-flippin-ninja-395771#chapter8

body:
Using Wit's End, Abyssal Sceptor, Sunfire, and Thornmail does some pretty silly damage against those pesky AD champs. :)

My first actual penta on Shen after 3+ years maining him.
